comments:
NullPointerException when generating test reports.

Using the 200504050020 TPTP driver (Eclipse SDK-3.1M5a), the following 
NullPointerException is thrown when generating test reports (e.g. test-
results\platform\org.eclipse.hyades.tests\AllManualTests.testsuite):

Using the TPTP_200504101503 driver, the below exception was thrown when 
generating a report from test-
results\platform\org.eclipse.hyades.tests\AllManualTests.testsuite.  Also, for 
better serviceability, is possible to flatten the multiple exceptions levels 
and provide exception messages?
